text:
@ddale8 So Louie doesn't understand how the mask thing works, eh? Big surprise there.

(Psst, @replouiegohmert -- masks are to protect us from YOU. You wear a mask in case you have #coronavirus and don't know it, so you don't breathe all over other people.)
